fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Map. You astrally roleblock them and see who they visit.
- After escaping, you may create a Backdoor at one house during the day, which appears during the night to all players. It acts identical to the Cavalry. You may only do this twice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Can talk to Redcoats at night, including after escaping.
- Access to "Volleyfire" factional ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Escape with all Redcoats. If a single Redcoat dies, the condition becomes kill everyone who opposes the king.
